parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post refers to Cǎlin Georgescu, although it does not explicitly advocate for or against him.  The analysis focuses on his ideology and past actions, which could be interpreted as influencing voters' opinions.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The content is not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>Potentially True. While the post doesn't explicitly urge voters to vote for or against Cǎlin Georgescu, the detailed analysis of his ideology and past actions aims to shape public perception, potentially influencing voting decisions. The concluding sentence ("NU ÎL VOI VOTA!") expresses the author's personal opinion, but the preceding analysis could be seen as an attempt to sway others' opinions.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Partially True. The post presents information about Cǎlin Georgescu's past associations and statements. However, the presentation is biased and lacks the objectivity expected from journalistic reporting. The inclusion of subjective opinions and the concluding statement expressing the author's voting intention further detract from journalistic neutrality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Partially True. The author clearly states their personal opinion ("NU ÎL VOI VOTA!"). However, this personal opinion is preceded by a detailed analysis of Cǎlin Georgescu's ideology and past actions, which could be interpreted as an attempt to influence the opinions of others, blurring the line between personal opinion and electoral propaganda.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2121783591655239</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while presenting itself as an analysis of Cǎlin Georgescu's ideology, exhibits characteristics of electoral propaganda.  The detailed examination of his past associations and statements, presented in a biased manner, aims to shape public perception.  The concluding statement expressing the author's intention not to vote for Georgescu, while ostensibly a personal opinion, reinforces the overall negative portrayal. The post's paid nature and broad reach on Facebook further strengthen the argument that it is intended to influence voters.  However, the lack of explicit calls to vote for or against a specific candidate makes a definitive conclusion challenging.  In dubio pro reo, the analysis leans towards considering it as electoral propaganda due to its potential to influence voters' opinions.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Cǎlin Georgescu</name>
    <impact>NEGATIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Cristian Rǎducǎ, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 2121783591655239), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care, deși prezentată ca o analiză a lui Cǎlin Georgescu, conține elemente de propagandă electorală.  Analiza detaliată a trecutului și a asociațiilor sale, prezentată într-un mod subiectiv și părtinitor, urmărește să influențeze percepția publică asupra candidatului.  Declarația finală a autorului, "NU ÎL VOI VOTA!", deși pare o opinie personală, întărește imaginea negativă creată.  Postarea plătită, cu o rază mare de cuprindere pe Facebook, sugerează intenția de a influența votul.  Având în vedere cheltuielile de sub 100 RON, conform Ad Library, și o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, impactul potențial este semnificativ.  Contactul autorului este cristian.raduca@gmail.com și +40722792301.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
